messages.messageBody:
Oh that's so nice! Thank you very much. I'll e-mail her today.
Thank you once again.
Karen

On Feb 16, 2008 10:12 AM, Jennifer Varela <gemini7772@...> wrote:
>
>
>
>
> I've been reading some of the posts in this thread and I was reminded of an
> unschooling family with adopted children who had serious trust issues like
> your daughter. I found her blog and emailed her, asking if I could share
> her blog link with another mom and here is her response:
>
> Please share the links to both my blogs and also to my adoption forum but
> also, tell her to e-mail me. I'd love to help her through this!
> http://anunschoolinglife.blogspot.com
> http://foreverparents.blogspot.com
> http://forums.foreverparents.com
>
> I didn't tell her anything about you, just that I knew of a mom who might
> find her blog helpful. Her name is Joanne and her email is:
> billyandjoanne@... if you'd like to email her.
>
> Jen
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] To Karen was: The Empty Cup Mind: was Unschooling and Dyslexia
messages.msgSnippet: I ve been reading some of the posts in this thread and I was reminded of an unschooling family with adopted children who had serious trust issues like your
messages.messageBody:
I've been reading some of the posts in this thread and I was reminded of an
unschooling family with adopted children who had serious trust issues like
your daughter. I found her blog and emailed her, asking if I could share
her blog link with another mom and here is her response:

Please share the links to both my blogs and also to my adoption forum but
also, tell her to e-mail me. I'd love to help her through this!
http://anunschoolinglife.blogspot.com
http://foreverparents.blogspot.com
http://forums.foreverparents.com

I didn't tell her anything about you, just that I knew of a mom who might
find her blog helpful. Her name is Joanne and her email is:
billyandjoanne@... if you'd like to email her.

Jen


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
